data_source_name: Pre-Generated Data Files for EPA AQS Site and Monitor Descriptions: United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Air Quality System (AQS).
data_source_description: The Air Quality System (AQS) contains ambient air pollution data collected by EPA, state, local, and tribal air pollution control agencies from over thousands of monitors across the United States. See https://aqs.epa.gov/aqsweb/airdata/download_files.html for downloads and https://aqs.epa.gov/aqsweb/airdata/FileFormats.html for data dictionaries.

data_source_name: Pre-Generated Data Files for EPA AQS Nationwide 2020 Daily Measures of PM2.5 at AQS Sites: United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Air Quality System (AQS).
data_source_description: The Air Quality System (AQS) contains ambient air pollution data collected by EPA, state, local, and tribal air pollution control agencies from over thousands of monitors across the United States. data_source_name: Pre-Generatd Data Files for CDC SVI by Census Tract: Center for Diseasae Control (CDC) Social Vulnerability Index (SVI).
data_source_description: The CDC/ATSDR Social Vulnerability Index (CDC/ATSDR SVI) uses 15 U.S. census variables to help local officials identify communities that may need support before, during, or after disasters. See https://www.atsdr.cdc.gov/placeandhealth/svi/index.html for a description and https://www.atsdr.cdc.gov/placeandhealth/svi/data_documentation_download.html for download and data documentation.
